title: Proud to Be Me!
description: Unique and special is what we all are, But the same we will never be... So let's celebrate you, And let's celebrate me! CHILDREN, GATHER AROUND! Proud to Be Me! is an inspirational book intended to encourage you to love yourself and others just as you are. Let's remind ourselves that there can never be enough LOVE â€“ no matter what your age!
author: Nicole Blais
